message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with. Fair and simple!
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not going all the way!
You went a bit high, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle again!
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more for my side of the negotiation
I'm getting close to my target, but I think we can still find a better split. Let's try again!
I think I've been too generous so far. Time to take a firmer stance!
I'm not giving up yet! Let's try to find a compromise that works for both of us.
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share. This is my final offer
I'm not giving up yet! I'll try to get a better deal, but I'm willing to compromise.
I've had enough of your games, Alice. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll try to get a better deal, but I'm getting desperate.
This is my final, final offer. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
